snippet: In bars and clubs in the East Village and on the Lower East Side, where Adam Yauch wrote some of his music, people celebrated the late rapper’s life on Friday.
abstract: People In bars and clubs in the New York's East Village and on the Lower East Side celebrate the life of late rapper and Beastie Boys founder Adam Yauch.
lead_paragraph: In bars and clubs in the East Village and on the Lower East Side, where Adam Yauch wrote some of his music, people celebrated the late rapper’s life on Friday.

headline.seo: East Village and Lower East Side Celebrate Life of Adam Yauch
headline.main: New York Neighborhoods Pay Tribute to a Beastie Boy
